entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
